name: Viachaslau Pratasenia
subtitle: I build things with Flutter.
full_description: As a Flutter developer at AventusIT, I focus on making easy-to-use apps for Android, iOS, web, and desktop. My goal is to build applications that are straightforward and enjoyable for everyone. By using Flutter, I work on creating innovative and accessible solutions that keep up with the latest technology trends.
about_me:
I am Viachaslau, a highly skilled Flutter developer with over 5 years of experience in the technology industry. My extensive knowledge and expertise in Flutter development make me the perfect candidate for any project in this field. I have a strong foundation in Android development, which I built upon to create accessible and user-focused apps for Android, iOS, web, and desktop using Flutter.

My experience developing Android apps has greatly influenced my approach to projects on Flutter. I create functional and intuitive solutions that enhance the user experience. I am passionate about solving complex problems and strive to create user-friendly designs. My goal is to create applications that not only meet but exceed user expectations.

Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:
contact_me_text: Although I’m not currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I’ll try my best to get back to you!

work.title: Flutter Developer
work.description:
As a Developer at 7VPN, I play a key role in a three-person development team. My responsibilities encompass a variety of platforms including iOS, macOS, Windows, and Web.

In addition to mobile and desktop development, I also create the personal account website. My technical contributions include integrating deep links, working with notifications, deploying social login features, news, creating build environments, and other features. 

Tools: XCode, Android Studio, Figma, Firebase, Google Cloud Platforms.

work.title: Flutter Developer
work.description:
At Symfa, I served as a crucial contributor to both our dating app and corporate chat service, akin to Slack. My role provided me a dynamic experience, from integrating Redux to adopting null safety and migrating to updated Flutter versions.

Beyond coding, my responsibilities also covered the entire spectrum of app publishing. I communicated actively with Google Play and App Store teams to troubleshoot issues and bugs, ensuring a seamless user experience post-launch.

Tools: Xcode, Android Studio, Figma, Firebase.

work.title: Android/Flutter Developer
work.description:
At Heapix, I functioned as an Android/Flutter developer and was involved in a diverse range of projects, including food delivery apps and smart home control systems. My role extended beyond coding, as I initiated applications from the ground up.

In collaboration with development, design, and management teams, I honed my skills in customer communication and even gathered experience in project management.

Tools: Android Studio, Figma, Firebase, Adobe Illustrator.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: This personal website created with Flutter and hosted on GitHub Pages. It's designed to be clean and user-friendly. You can view the source code on GitHub to see how it was built and maybe even contribute. This site demonstrates how versatile Flutter can be for web projects.

projects.title: Never Have I Ever
projects.description: Never Have I Ever is a mobile app that allows you to play the popular party game with your friends, more than 10 categories, 2000+ questions. The app was created using Flutter and is available on Google Play.

projects.title: Workout Tracker App Design
projects.description: This workout tracker app design, made in Figma, combines easy navigation with a sleek look to help users track their fitness journey effortlessly. The focus is on simplicity, making sure users can quickly log workouts and see their progress.

blog_posts.title: The Easiest Way to Use Environments in Flutter
blog_posts.description: In this article, we'll explore how to use environment variables in your projects without needing extra libraries. Environment variables help keep your settings secure and make your code easier to update.

blog_posts.title: Styling Flutter Apps Made Easy with Google Fonts
blog_posts.description: Learn how to quickly improve your Flutter apps look with Google Fonts. This article will show you how to pick and use different fonts easily, making your apps more stylish with little effort.

blog_posts.title: Flutter Version Management: A Comprehensive Guide
blog_posts.description: This guide covers Flutter Version Management (FVM), a tool for efficiently handling multiple Flutter SDKs. It simplifies SDK installation, version switching and project consistency.
